description:
Connect your devices into a secure WireGuardÂ®-based overlay network with SSO, MFA and granular access controls.

NetBird combines a configuration-free peer-to-peer private network and a centralized access control system in a single platform, making it easy to create secure private networks for your organization or home.
Connect. NetBird creates a WireGuard-based overlay network that automatically connects your machines over an encrypted tunnel, leaving behind the hassle of opening ports, complex firewall rules, VPN gateways, and so forth.
Secure. NetBird enables secure remote access by applying granular access policies while allowing you to manage them intuitively from a single place. Works universally on any infrastructure.
What's Changed
- [misc] Introducing NetBird Guru on Gurubase.io by @kursataktas in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2778
- [misc] use google domain for tests by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2902
- [misc] Update signing pipeline version by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2900
- [management] Add transaction metrics and exclude getAccount time from peers update by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2904
- [client] Add NB_SKIP_SOCKET_MARK & fix crash instead of returing an error by @nazarewk in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2899
- [management] Fix process posture check evaluation on Sync by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2911
- [management] Add metric for peer meta update by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2913
- [management] Add activity events to group propagation flow by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2916
- [client] Fix allow netbird rule verdict by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2925
- [management] Fix getSetupKey call by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2927
New Contributors
- @kursataktas made their first contribution in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2778
Full Changelog: https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/compare/v0.32.0...v0.33.0
